item.title: Kasa Smart WiFi Motion Sensor Switch, Single Pole, Needs Neutral Wire, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Light Switch, Compatible with Alexa & Google Home, UL Certified, No Hub Required(KS200M),White,1-Pack
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) The KS200M is smart switch with an advanced motion and ambient light sensor built in. Ideal for areas where hand-free operation is ideal, the KS200M is perfect for those who want more automation in their home, including those with limited mobility or those with children in the home. Walk into ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99 - $21.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:12 UTC – Details)


The KS200M is smart switch with an advanced motion and ambient light sensor built in. Ideal for areas where hand-free operation is ideal, the KS200M is perfect for those who want more automation in their home, including those with limited mobility or those with children in the home. Walk into a room and have your lights automatically turn on. Lights can be programmed to turn off after a set time without motion detection to save on electricity. The smart switch also includes an ambient light sensor that will detect daylight conditions and prevent the lights from turning on during the daytime if desired. Fully customize your experience with settings based on your routine. Best of all, the KS200M is hands-free, voice controllable, and app accessed. From Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, to Samsung SmartThings, the Kasa Smart KS200M gives you convenient voice controls.You can expect Kasa Smart quality with the KS200M which has undergone rigorous safety testing and has been UL certified by 3rd party Underwriter Laboratories. In addition, the device is backed by an industry leading 2-year limited warranty. If you are one of the 7 million plus Kasa Smart users, you will also appreciate that the KS200M is compatible with other Kasa devices meaning, you can set groups, and smart actions to work in conjunction with other Kasa Smart devices.Take control of your smart lighting, and have total automated freedom with the Kasa Smart KS200M Smart Switch with motion sensor.This which can achieve more automation, intelligence, and personalized settings. Standard: IEEE802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi Standard: 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi only Max load: 600W INC, 3000 W CFL/LED. Power Supply: AC 100~125 V, 50/60 Hz Neutral Wire Required. 2-year warranty.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 5.06 x 3.33 x 1.82 inches; 3.52 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ KS200M
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ TP-LINK
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B099KGWGQM
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ Vietnam

【Advanced Motion Detection】Completely hands-free and smart operation of your connected lights. The switch automatically turns lights on when motion is detected and turns off after a preset time. Ideal for areas such as bedrooms, hallways and restrooms where hands-free operation is ideal.
【Daylight Detection】Smart ambient light detection will sense daylight and prevent lights from turning on during the day.
【Smart Mode & Away Mode】Set different light triggers based on your routine for effortless control. Automatically turns devices on and off at different times to give the appearance that someone is home.
【Works w/ All Bulb Types】600W Incandescent/Halogen, 300W LED/CFL/MLV/ELV
【Voice & App Control】Manage your device with voice commands via Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, or Samsung SmartThings. Hands-free operation of your lights from anywhere through the free Kasa app.
【Trusted & Reliable】The KS200M is UL certified, meaning rigorous testing is done for safety and certified by a 3rd party laboratory. Includes our industry leading 2-year warranty. Kasa is trusted by over 7 million users worldwide.
【Kasa Smart Action】A part of the Kasa Smart Ecosystem, the switch works with other Kasa devices, so you can set smart actions, and groupings with your other Kasa devices.
【Guided Setup】As with all Kasa products, you can follow the easy to use Kasa app to guide you through the install process. This product requires a neutral wire for installation. If you are not familiar with electrical wiring, we always recommend using a licensed electrician to help with the installation.

Motion-Activated Lighting

With advanced motion-sensing technology, the KS200M Smart Switch eliminates the need to manually turn on/off your lights. No more fumbling for the lights in the dark or while holding your groceries. Upgrade your light switch and experience next level convenience for your family.

State of the Art Motion Sensor

The KS200M features a state-of-the-art motion sensor with an ultra-wide field of view and able to detect motion up to 25 ft. away. Rest-assured knowing that motion will be detected from near or far when you need it.

Previous page

  1. Ambient Light Detection

    The light sensor allows you to use the environmental lighting as a smart trigger for Smart Controls.

  2. Smart Control

    Set the light to turn on/off with light-based, motion-based, or manual triggers during set hours.

  3. Cost and Energy Saving

    Save money and energy by turning off automatically if no motion is detected or if it’s bright.

Next page

1 Ambient Light Detection 2 Smart Control 3 Cost and Energy Saving

Previous page

  1. Voice Control

    Have Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant get the lights instead, leaving you hands free!

  2. App Control

    Set the lights from anywhere, anytime via the free and intuitive app, along with all Kasa devices.

  3. Manually Control

    Turn on/off with a simple tap of the switch, or double-tap to turn it on for a set amount of time.

Next page

1 Voice Control 2 App Control 3 Manually Control

Designed for Safety

This switch is UL Certified. UL94-V0 PC flame-retardant materials help minimize burning hazards.

Schedules

Easily create an automatic schedule for your lights any day of the week following your daily routine.

Timer

Set a timer to turn off your connected device automatically as needed.

Group

Combine your smart switch with other Kasa Smart devices for seamless control with a single tap on Kasa app.

4.5

Product Description

Peasur 138 LED Solar Lights Outdoor

Solar light has motion smart sensor, which can detect motion sensitively. Use the sun to charge during the day and automatically light up at night. It is ideal for night lighting of pathways, driveways, gardens, hallways, patios, etc.Our solar security light has 3 modes to choose from, you can choose different modes according to your needs.MODE 1.[ Constant light mode]: Auto power on at night, auto power off during the day.This mode can be on for 5-8 hours.MODE 2.[Dim light sensor mode]：Low brightness no motion,full brightness when the motion is detected.Detection time is about 20 seconds.MODE 3.[Sensor light mode]: Full brightness when the motion is detected,close when no motion.(Recommended to use.)Detection time is about 20 seconds.

Warm Tip:

You need to install the solar panel in a place where the sun can shine, and the charging effect will be better when the switch is turned on.Please install the solar panel in a place where the sun can shine, the best installation height is 2-3 meters, the sensor is the most sensitive.If you need to open it during the day, you need to cover the solar panel to light up.The first time you use it, you need to tear off the plastic film on the surface of the solar panel and expose them to more than 8 hours.

Brighter & Larger Coverage Lighting

Product Description

Myhaptim Outdoor Wall Sconce Fixture with GFCI Outlet

Our porch light motion sensor with GFCI Outlet, a combination of vintage and modern design, is perfect for most outdoor settings such as garages, porches, front doors, gardens, balconies, patios, entrances, driveways, patios, foyers, etc.

When the dusk to dawn motion sensor (enters test mode, in this mode can also be sensed during the day), the light will turn off after 5 seconds. When motion sensing is turned on again after 2 minutes (automatically in normal working mode, in which it can only be sensed at night), the light will turn off after 2 minutes. Each time it is sensed, it is in normal working mode.Unlike other outdoor lights on the market, this light has a downward GFCI outlet design that protects the outlet from rain.This front porch light has been designed to the best degree of sensing sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time after sensing.

Suitable for any dimmable E26 bulb

It maybe malfunctioned or flicker with Non-dimmable bulb.Bulbs are not included in the product

Motion Sensor Outdoor Lights with 2 GFCI Outlet

Specification

Voltage: 110-125v

Color:White

Power Source: Corded-Electric

14.5 AWG Input Wire

Max Load : 1080w

Installation Type: Hardwired/Wall Mount

Sensing Range: Distance 33FT, Angle 270°

Material: Aluminum & Tempered Glass

Color: Matte Black & Hand-painting Golden Edge

Base Type: E26 Base, 100W Max.

3 Upgraded Motion Sensor Lighting Modes

Just turn the wall switch “on-off-on” within 0.5~2sec. to shift to manual mode, keeping 100% brightness at night for 8 hours, but will auto turn off at dawn.

Saving electricity for you, it won’t turn on at dusk and will be highly bright when motion is detected and off with no detection.

These outdoor lights will turn on at 30% brightness at dusk and keep highly bright when motion is detected. (It is the high mode when it arrives)

Easy access to any outdoor activity when you need power

About GFCI Outlet

Simply turn on the light and plug in your security cameras, party party décor, power tools, garden tools, etc.

Plugged the device into the GFCI outlet, if the device is not powered, please check the following steps:

1) Please check whether the device is plugged into the GFCI outlet tightly.

2) If the device is connected to the GFCI outlet correctly but still does not work:

A. Check whether the TEST button pops up and the Red LED indicator is always on. If so, it indicates that the connected device is short-circuited, please unplug the device and correct the circuit fault.

B. After troubleshooting, press the TEST button first, then press the RESET button, and then plug the device, if the Green LED indicator flashes, it indicates that the GFCI outlet is working properly; if the TEST button pop up once again and the Red LED indicator is on again, it indicates that the device short circuit fault is not eliminated successfully, please repeat steps A to B.

Weather Resistance & Durability

In addition to the rust-resistant aluminum and water-resistant matter black coating, this exterior house light has passed salt spray testing and multiple weather conditions such as heavy rain, snowstorms, hurricanes and hot sun to protect the light body. The sturdy aluminum material and tempered glass ensure that it will not rust or corrode for years

Dusk to Dawn Motion Sensor

Upgrade the dusk to dawn motion sensor, through infrared induction, when the detection of motion will light up, no detection when closed, to save you power.

GFCI Outlet

Built-in 2 GFCI OUTLET for your outdoor power supply with added protection against surges, short circuits and other electrical faults

【3 LIGHT MODES】: The upgraded outdoor lights are built-in dusk to dawn motion sensor and bringing 3 working modes. (Manual / Low / High)①Manual mode: just turn the wall-mounted switch “on-off-on” within 0.5~2 secondso shift to manual mode,keeping 100% brightness for 8 hours at night ,the dusk-to-dawn sensor detects morning and will automatically turn off. (Note: light switch in ON position, Sensing distance: 33FT, Sensing angle: 270°),②Low Mode: Saving electricity for you, it won’t turn on at dusk and will be highly bright when motion is detected and off with no detection. ③High Mode: These outdoor lights will turn on at 30% brightness at dusk and keep highly bright when motion is detected
【CLASSIC STYLE & MULTIPLE-SCENE】: Vintage rustic design that adds sophistication to any outdoor decor, this outside lights the aluminum finish pairs perfectly with most outdoor occasions, such as patio,garages,balcony,front porches,doorways,gardens,hallways
【WEATHER RESISTANT & STURDY MATERIAL】: White dusk to dawn motion sensor front porch lights , using rust-proof metal frame and thickened reinforced tempered water glass as a lampshade, lamp bezel coating waterproof golden quality aluminum, can waterproof, corrosion-resistant, anti-rust, can effectively resist heavy rain, snow, ice, high temperature and other weather, in these weather conditions, can be used for a longer period of time than the light fixtures on the market and don’t worry about the quality of the problem.
【RECOMMENDED BULB & E26 BASE】: Our outdoor wall sconce does not include a bulb and uses a UL listed E26 base for long life, compatible with any kind of standard E26 LED bulb/incandescent bulb (Max 60W), the open design of the bottom of this fixture makes it easy for you to install the bulb or clean the fixture without disassembly, for a better experience, it is recommended to choose a dimmable incandescent or LED bulb, otherwise it will malfunction or flicker
【EASY INSTALLATION】: The package of the porch light comes with installation instructions and mounting hardware, just finish the installation on the wall, remember to press the “Reset” or “Test” button between the GFCI sockets to reset the sockets and test the use, otherwise the light will probably not turn on, there will be no power output on the sockets, induction Sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time are not adjustable, please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about this outdoor light.
【IMPORTANT NOTE】When the motion sensing is on for the first time (Enter Test Mode, it can also be sensed during the day in this mode), the light will be turned off after 5 seconds. When the motion sensing is on again after 2 minutes (Automatically Enter Normal Working Mode, it only can be sensed on the night in this mode), the light will be turned off after 2 minutes. After that, every time it is sensed, it is Normal Working Mode.If you are not familiar with electrical knowledge, please contact an electrician to install
【3-Year Warranty】We provide 3 years warranty and replacement or refund within 30 days; Although we trust the premium design and high-end quality of our product, if you are not satisfied, you can ask for a full refund with no additional questions asked.
